Nutwood - Winter Haven, Florida- Visit Central Florida Skip to content Go to VISIT CENTRAL FLORIDA SPORTS Open main menu Close main menu Deals & Specials Welcome Center Meetings & Conventions Travel Guide Blog Search Search for submit Events See & Do Eat & Drink Stay Cities & Towns Meetings Deals & Specials Facebook Twitter Pinterest Instagram YouTube Nutwood Nutwood is a farm to table restaurant in downtown Winter Haven. Nutwood's dedication to locally sourced products is evident in its seasonal menus. Visit the restaurant's website or Facebook page for current offerings. Farm-to-Table Restaurant in Winter Haven A renowned farm-to-table restaurant nestled in the heart of Winter Haven , Florida, Nutwood, believes in celebrating the region’s rich agricultural heritage by sourcing the freshest ingredients directly from local farmers, ensuring an unparalleled dining experience for their guests. With a commitment to sustainability and community, Nutwood embraces the concept of farm-to-table dining, where each dish tells a story of the land it comes from. Their talented chefs work closely with trusted farmers to curate a seasonal menu that showcases the best flavors Central Florida has to offer. From vibrant heirloom tomatoes to succulent grass-fed beef, every ingredient on your plate is carefully selected to guarantee exceptional taste and quality. Experience the true essence of farm-to-table dining at Nutwood in Winter Haven. With its dedication to locally sourced ingredients, exceptional flavors, and a warm and inviting atmosphere, Nutwood is a culinary destination that will leave you with a lasting impression. Make your reservation today ! Skip to main content LinkedIn Top Content People Learning Jobs Games Sign in Join now Nutwood Pubs Ltd’s Post Nutwood Pubs Ltd 305 followers 1y Report this post Why not join us for Weekends at The Woodman... 

Ice cold drinks, delicious cuisine and the warmest of welcomes. Craft, Cask, Fine Wines and a vast array of premium spirits and liqueurs. Whatevers your favourite tipple we've got you covered down here at The Woodman. 

Including locally sourced products such as Cranes Cider, Baron's Craft Beer and Jakes Gin.

Food service times are Saturday 12-2.30pm for lunch service & 4.30-8.30pm for dinner service. Sunday 12-5pm. 

We have our Ala Carte Menu, kids menu, specials and of course on Sunday's our sumptuous Sunday Roasts... 

BOOKING IS ADVISABLE... https://lnkd.in/eBk7NqFq woodman@nutwoodpubs.com 01763 848328 
SG88NB

Nutwood Pubs Ltd | LinkedIn Skip to main content LinkedIn Articles People Learning Jobs Games Join now Sign in Nutwood Pubs Ltd Hospitality London, London 305 followers Nutwood Pubs are a group of heart-of-the-community pubs and restaurants Follow View all 7 employees Report this company About us Nutwood Pubs are a group of heart-of-the-community pubs and restaurants that consistently deliver an exceptional combination of high-quality fresh food and drinks, with traditional English countryside hospitality. Our venues offer everything from comfortable evenings by the fireside to once-in-a-lifetime event experiences.  Everyone is invited to enjoy our renowned warm and friendly welcome. Website www.nutwoodpubs.com External link for Nutwood Pubs Ltd Industry Hospitality Company size 51-200 employees Headquarters London, London Type Privately Held Founded 2018 Locations Primary London, London N134XS, GB Get directions Employees at Nutwood Pubs Ltd Gavin Turl Managing Director at Nutwood Pubs Ltd Stefwan Beal -- See all employees Updates Nutwood Pubs Ltd 305 followers 3h Report this post We are recruiting for a full time Team Leader for The Woodman Inn Nuthampstead Herts (SG88NB) 

Beautiful country pub, restaurant & event space, full fresh food offering. 

We know EVERYONE in hospitality is recruiting for super stars right now, but WHY IS Nutwood Pubs Ltd different? 

A lot of businesses say it but at Nutwood we live it and breathe it, we are all about our people, our guests and the experiences we deliver! We can't have great venues or deliver great experiences without great teams in our businesses!

We are on the hunt for exceptional people to join us in our mission to build something truly special and unique in the hospitality world...

Competitive rates of pay depending on experience. Plus, 
-Free Staff Meals
-30% Staff discount 
-Unlimited soft and hot drinks on shift 
-Tips/Share of service charge (approx extra £2-£3 extra ph)
-Free Parking 
-Uniform provided and lots of training opportunities 
-Flexible hours 
-Huge scope for progression in a growing company 
-Working in a very historic venue packed with character

Nutwood Pubs is a small but expanding hospitality group comprising of pubs, restaurants, coffee shops and wedding venues set to expand further over the next couple of years. 

In order to aid this, we are recruiting the best of the best from far and wide to aid the growth and development of our wonderful little pub group. Huge opportunity to get in at ground floor level and be part of something really quite special. Massive opportunity for internal progression within the company. 

Nutwood prides itself in the quality of it's people and the quality of the service/products we deliver. Nutwood really is all about people and interactions. 

Great teams in all our businesses, very low staff turnover, very proactive and inclusive business culture with a massive focus on internal growth and development of our people.

If interested please email your cv to gb@nutwoodpubs.com .
.
. #hospitalityjobs #teamleaderjobs #Recruitment #vacancies #werehiring #joinus #fulltime #parttime #careeropportunities #pubjobs #restaurantjobs #traininganddevelopment #Nutwoodpubs Like Comment Share Nutwood Pubs Ltd 305 followers 1w Report this post The latest Nutwood Newsletter is out now!

This month’s edition is packed with exciting updates from across the Nutwood family—from the reopening of The Duncombe Arms in Waresley to Chris Hornby - Brand Photographer 's rebranded career as well as reflections from the recent Hospitality Forum and networking mornings.

Whether you're a hospitality professional, a local supplier, or a community partner, the Nutwood Newsletter is your window into how we’re keeping the traditional pub alive! https://lnkd.in/empDNjjy Nutwood Network Chris Hornby - Brand Photographer Christopher Hinchliff Angie Ridgwell 4 Like Comment Share Nutwood Pubs Ltd 305 followers 1w Report this post A good new pub story! 

After 18 months closed, The Duncombe Arms is set to reopen under Nutwood Pubs! 

This Waresley gem is back—with fresh energy, local flavours, and a soon to be full calendar of community events!

With the Duncombe Arms joining the Nutwood family of pubs, members of the free-to-join Nutwood Club will be able to use Nutwood Points at The Duncombe Arms, as well as the other Nutwood pubs. 
The pub has sat at the heart of Waresley for many generations, and as the doors reopen in the next few weeks, Nutwood Pubs will be inviting the wider community to reclaim their pub with new vigour.

As with all other Nutwood pubs, the aim is to host a vibrant calendar of community events and activities – from quiz nights and live music to book clubs and craft workshops. Its menus will showcase the best of local producers, and it will be a place where friends and families can look forward to delicious lunches, relaxed evenings and amazing Sunday roasts. 

“Pubs are the heartbeat of village life… We’re not just reopening a pub; we’re reviving a gathering place where everyone feels at home,” says Ian Hawthorne, the new manager of The Duncombe Arms. 

Nutwood’s founder Martin Prescott calls it “a joy and an honour” to restore 'the Dunk' to its rightful place. We can't wait to welcome you back 
The pub aims to reopen the doors in mid-September. 14 Like Comment Share Nutwood Pubs Ltd 305 followers 1mo Report this post Making Memorable Moments Happen once-in-a-lifetime celebrations like weddings and milestone birthdays to wakes, corporate presentations and buzzing networking events—events are a major part of what we do at Nutwood Pubs. 
While each of our locations is supported by an excellent management team, they're in turn supported by our dedicated Nutwood Events Team. Focused on sales, coordination, and on-the-day oversight, they ensure every detail is handled with care, professionalism, and a smile. So whether you’re planning a marquee wedding in Nuthampstead or Christmas in Great Chishill, you can relax knowing you’ll be looked after by some of the best in the business.
Celebrating with Nutwood isn’t just booking a venue—it’s partnering with a team that knows how to make magic happen. 3 Like Comment Share Nutwood Pubs Ltd 305 followers 1mo Report this post What an inspiring evening at Tuesday’s Hospitality Forum! Thank you to everyone who joined us—industry leaders, change-makers and managers alike—and shared insights that helped us tackle the biggest challenges facing pubs, restaurants and bars today.

Our conversations highlighted the pressures on hospitality, but more importantly, they ignited fresh thinking around the creation of new opportunities, innovation and strategies to keep doors open and profits healthy. Insights from Mark Smith from Zonal , Eloise Mayer of AB InBev and Sandra Kelly of UKHospitality provided much-needed awareness from cross-sections of the industry. We were also pleased to host Christopher Hinchliff (MP). It is reassuring to note that industry discussions such as these are on the radar of those who can help make the changes. 

Collaboration—from country pubs and small-town bars to restaurants, EPOS providers and distilleries—will be crucial if we want to adapt and thrive in these uncertain times. To keep the momentum going, we encourage you to follow UKHospitality and stay connected to the initiatives they champion. As one of the UK’s largest employment sectors, our collective voice must be heard by those making long-term decisions.

We’re excited to continue this dialogue and explore new partnerships that will help us beat the trend and shape the future of hospitality. Please share your key takeaways or upcoming projects in the comments—we’d love to hear how you’re driving change in your corner of the industry! Rae Hayzelden Mumford & Worrall Ricky Williams ATTEND2HEALTH LIMITED Jack Risbridger Nutwood Network Michael Coe 14 1 Comment Like Comment Share Nutwood Pubs Ltd 305 followers 1mo Report this post At Nutwood Pubs, we've partnered with some incredible local photographers over the years, working together on food shoots, events, and guided visuals that help define our brand. Their professional expertise brings flair, precision, and artistry to everything we do.
But some of our favourite moments come not from studio lighting and staged plates - but from the spontaneous magic caught on mobile phones by our managers.
From mouth-watering dishes to clinking drinks and everyday smiles, our team takes pride in sharing the candid, behind-the-scenes beauty of Nutwood life. These snapshots celebrate what we’re really about: friendly faces, welcoming spaces, and the joy of a well-poured pint.
We’ll always lean on professionals for the big moments—but when it comes to day-to-day storytelling, our team has the instinct, heart, and creativity to show the true face of Nutwood. 5 Like Comment Share Nutwood Pubs Ltd reposted this Nutwood Pubs Ltd 305 followers 2mo Report this post Calling all hospitality professionals, pub and bar owners. You're invited to the first Hospitality Forum 2025. 

You can expect an exclusive evening tailored for hospitality professionals and business owners. Join a dynamic gathering of industry leaders, entrepreneurs, and stakeholders to discuss the latest hospitality trends, innovative financial strategies, and collaborative opportunities shaping the future of the sector. 

Join us in finding strategies to succeed in challenging times.

Date: Tuesday, 22nd July  
Time: 6:30 PM
Venue: The Woodman Inn, Nuthampstead, SG8 8NB


Complimentary soft drink and bar snacks provided 
Pre-registration essential | Free admission 
Reserve your spot now: network@nutwoodpubs.com 6 Like Comment Share Nutwood Pubs Ltd 305 followers 1mo Report this post Saturday Nights Just Got a Whole Lot Tastier!
At Nutwood Pubs, we believe great evenings start with extraordinary food, and Head Chef Stefan, from The Woodman Inn,  is serving up just that. 
Every Saturday night, Stefan showcases his creativity and culinary flair with three standout chef’s cuts: a weekly-changing selection of dishes designed to surprise and delight. These are more than meals—they’re flavour-packed experiences.

Previous highlights have included Classic Beef Wellington with Truffle Parmesan Fries, Orange & Honey Glazed Pork Loin with Apple and Radish Salad, and even Seared Salmon with Pea & Asparagus Risotto. 

No two weeks are the same, and that’s what makes it magical. Whether you’re a regular or trying us for the first time, Saturday night is your perfect way to experience a Nutwood pub. 7 Like Comment Share Nutwood Pubs Ltd 305 followers 2mo Report this post Chefs Wanted! Sous, Senior Sous & Head Chef Wanted: 

Hourly/ Salaried or Freelance, live in available...

Sous Chef Wanted for Woodman Inn Nuthampstead £13-£16ph
Sous Chef Wanted for Duncombe Arms Waresley £13-£16ph
Senior Sous Chef Wanted for Duncombe Arms Warsely £14-£18ph
Head Chef Wanted for The Pheasant Great Chishill £18-£22ph 

No sponsorship or agencies please. 

We know EVERYONE is recruiting for Chef positions right now, but WHY IS Nutwood Pubs Ltd different? 

A lot of businesses say it but at Nutwood we live it and breathe it, we are all about our people, our guests and the experiences we deliver! We can't have great venues or deliver great experiences without great teams in our businesses, especially in our kitchens!

We are on the hunt for exceptional people to join us in our mission to build something truly special and unique in the hospitality world...

We have great existing teams, totally fresh, beautiful country pubs nestled in the heart of the villages. Loads of scope to grow both the businesses and the roles. 

-Free Staff Meals
-30% Staff discount 
-Unlimited soft and hot drinks on shift 
-Tips/Share of service charge (approx £2-£3 extra ph)
-Free Parking 
-Uniform provided and lots of training opportunities 
-Flexible hours 
-Huge scope for progression in a growing company 
-Working in a very historic venues packed with character and a renowned reputation for the quality of its food and service situated deep in the beautiful British countryside

Nutwood Pubs is a small but expanding hospitality group comprising of pubs, restaurants, coffee shops and wedding venues set to expand further over the next couple of years. 

In order to aid this, we are recruiting the best of the best from far and wide to aid the growth and development of our wonderful little pub group. Huge opportunity to get in at ground floor level and be part of something really quite special. Massive opportunity for internal progression within the company. 

Nutwood prides itself in the quality of it's people and the quality of the service/products we deliver. Nutwood really is all about people and interactions. Great teams in all our businesses, very low staff turnover, very proactive and inclusive business culture with a massive focus on internal growth and development of our people.

If interested please email your cv to davidk@nutwoodpubs.com .
.
. #hospitalityjobs #chefjobs #recruitment #vacancies #werehiring #joinus #fulltime #careeropportunities #pubjobs #restaurantjobs #traininganddevelopment #greatchisill #cambs #Nuthampstead #Herts #Nutwoodpubs 1 Like Comment Share Nutwood Pubs Ltd 305 followers 2mo Report this post Exciting news today from Nutwood HQ, we'd like to introduce both Karen & Ian (pictured here with our Finance Director and Founder Martin) they have recently joined us and bring a wealth of hospitality knowledge and experience to their roles.

We are proud to announce they'll be taking the helm of our delayed but highly anticipated new opening The stunning Duncombe Arms in the beautiful village of Waresley!
